description: close up of a man's face with large expressive eyes; under his chin is a bowtie and there is a row of small buildings along the margin on the right side
inscription: LLC in plate: 17.u.18. | LL margin of sheet, in pencil: Probedruck. E.125-I | LLC of sheet in pencil, on verso: I. Zustand | ULC of sheet in pencil, on verso: 2197
signed: LR in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté. / 18. | LL in pencil, below image: November-Porträt.
title: November Portrait (Self-Portrait)
